page.title: 19THE MOUNTAIN OVER CADOXTON-1
page.content: The most famous thing on the mountain behind our school is the{Golf {Club.}People come from all over the place to play there. It is a large course,covering{approximately 220 {acres of land.}It was founded in 1934 by a man called Mr.J.Braid,with only a few members but today the membership is 570. The course is mostly mountain pasture but there are many shrubs as well as coniferous and deciduous trees dotted around the area. Also on top of the mountain are two {farms - Ty-Draw and Gelli-march. Mrs.E.Price owns Ty-Draw and the farm covers 90 acres of land. The land-use is mostly rough-grazing,so the farmer specialises in keeping store cattle. There are 34 cattle on the farm at present;they are bought from Neath Cattle Market,kept for a year and sold again at the same market.
